description: Number of solutions to c(1)*prime(4) + ... + c(n)*prime(n+3) = 1, where c(i) = +-1 for i>1, c(1) = 1.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
maple: A022904 := proc(n)    local a,b,cs,cslen ;    a := 0 ;    for b from 0 to 2^(n-1)-1 do        cs := convert(b,base,2) ;        cslen := nops(cs) ;        if cslen < n-1 then            cs := [op(cs),seq(0,i=1..n-1-cslen)] ;        end if;        if ithprime(4)+add( (-1+2*op(i-4,cs)) *ithprime(i),i=5..n+3) = 1 then            a := a+1 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 06 2015
